pageTitle: FaceShooter : Hunter : World of Warcraft AddOns
textBeforeTable: Optional Files (2) - Shot rotation still not as accurate as I'd like, seems to delay signature shot a bit too much, sometimes suggests Steady/Cobra shots a bit too much - No level 90+ features implemented yet (Dreanor perks, Focusing shot etc) - Frenzy / Focus fire mechanism not implemented yet - Steady Focus not ready for release - Careful aim not implemented yet Still under development: -Amended/Updated: Lots... - Removed: Hunters Mark, Lynx Rush, All T13 and T14 set bonuses, Lynx Rush & Serpent Sting (Now Passive), Aimed Shot breakpoints, Master Marksman etc. 1.2.0 -No changed code at all. Just repackaged as a zip not rar 1.2.0 - Now correctly identifies friendly units - Barrage option now enable by default - Fix for Barrage 1.2.1 - Still to come: Steady Focus and Frenzy - Now accounts for lowered shot costs when Bestial Wrath is active - Careful Aim now implemented for Marksman, Prioritizes Steady and Aimed Shots when Target health > 80% or when Rapid Fire is active. Can be enabled / disabled / enabled for boss level targets 1.2.2 - 5 Nov 2014 Bug
